summary: Hyperscalers (Meta, Google, Microsoft) are aggressively increasing AI-focused Capex in 2024/2025, with Meta guiding to $35-40B, Google to ~$48B, and Microsoft to ~$50B. H100/A100 rental prices remain high at $3.15/hr, indicating sustained demand. Rumors of GPT-5 and Gemini 2 releases further signal market expansion.
